pages.title: What Am I Looking At?
pages.text: What Am I Looking At? (WAILA) is a HUD tooltip addition that displays infomration on the thing youre looking at. It integrates with many mods, showing information such as health, energy, aspects and debug (if enabled).$(br2)Holding down shift/sneak in some circumstances can reveal information that is otherwise hidden which is intended to reduce bulk of the tooltip.

pages.title: Information
pages.text: The tooltip can be customized under options > mod options.
